tool_description: A list of postal codes in Canada
title: Canada Postal Codes

api_list.name: Get postal codes by id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://canada-postal-codes.p.rapidapi.com/XIZgTa/postalcode/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "canada-postal-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all postal code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://canada-postal-codes.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "canada-postal-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
